whatwedo.one: We are your thought partner. Based on your business requirements, we advice and co-create comprehensive and suitable cybersecurity solutions
whatwedo.two: Our mission is to deliver cybersecurity solutions and pick the right technology for your businesses. We combine our team’s diverse experiences to serve various business groups.
whatwedo.three: At CyberGenics, we comply with international standards such as NIST Cybersecurity Framework, ISO 27001

aboutus.subtitle: About Us
aboutus.title: The leading cybersecurity consultant and comprehensive cybersecurity solution provider.
aboutus.description: Our experts are proactive and adaptable. We can quickly provide comprehensive cybersecurity measures to match our motto “Cybersecurity in every DNA.”

whyus.one: As a professional leader, we have gained expertise and experiences from developing cybersecurity solutions & systems for various organizations and industries for more than 33 years.
whyus.two: We have proactive mindset and adaptable plan to match constant changes and monitor every threats in cyberspace.
whyus.three: We strive and reach the goals with Partner Mindset Team. Give your business the most efficient results.
whyus.four: We are the cybersecurity expert team. Ready for all-scale service delivery. Commit to making SLA reaches 85%+
whyus.header: The Value of Trust “Cybersecurity in every DNA.”

services.scope:
Combine protection and detection technologies to strengthen your IT infrastructure.
Safeguard your organization for advanced threats and unusual behaviors.

ss.title: Network Perimeter Security
ss.subtitle: Implement cybersecurity technologies to divide, detect, and eliminate abnormal behaviors.

ss.title: Internet Gateway Security
ss.subtitle: Monitor organization’s incoming and outgoing Internet traffic to protect against cyber threats.

services.scope: Improve visibility and protects your ICS infrastructure against attacks with zero disruption.

ss.title: IoT/OT Visibility
ss.subtitle:
Expand visibility into ICS infrastructure to discover all assets.
Detect cyber threats with ICS-specific knowledge.

ss.title: ICS Protection
ss.subtitle: Implement the appropriate protection technology for the ICS infrastructure without affecting the entire system.

services.scope: Protect cloud environments from cybersecurity threats. Give administrators complete visibility and abilities to assign access controls for safe connections from anywhere at any time.

ss.title: Cloud Infrastructure Protection
ss.subtitle: Give your cloud the same security as on-premises infrastructure.

ss.title: Secure Service Edge
ss.subtitle: Protect your data and network by preventing unauthorized access to the Internet, cloud, and personal apps. Give control to the right users.

ss.title: Cloud Native Application Protection
ss.subtitle: Provides security and compliance audits for cloud applications throughout their lifecycle from build to deployment.

services.scope: Secure your endpoints. Manage device access to enterprise asset. Continuously detect and eliminate abnormal behaviors.

ss.title: Endpoint Protection
ss.subtitle: Safeguard threats against your endpoints with technologies that integrate antivirus, device and application control, intrusion prevention, and data protection.

ss.title: Endpoint Detection and Response
ss.subtitle: Detect and investigate anomalous behaviors to identify and mitigate threats and their impact.

services.scope: Identify and ensure users get the right level of access to enterprise resources.

ss.title: Identity and Access Management
ss.subtitle: Identify and assign the right permissions to users from their first day to the last.

ss.title: Privileged Acccess Management
ss.subtitle: Protect against privileged identity theft and mitigate its impact. Generate audit reports for privileged user activities.

ss.title: Multi-Factor Authentication
ss.subtitle: Identify users more accurately using information from smart devices, security tokens or one-time passwords.

services.scope: Protect valuable digital asset from unauthorized access. Continuously monitor data usage to prevent cyber theft

ss.title: Data Protection
ss.subtitle: Protect valuable data stored anywhere from cyber attacks and data theft.

ss.title: Data Breach Detection
ss.subtitle: Monitor and protect sensitive information from cyber theft no matter how or where it travels.

ss.title: Database Activity Monitoring
ss.subtitle: Real-time monitoring and analysis of database activities to provide an overview for investigating and reporting violations and abnormal behaviors.

services.scope: Connect various detection technologies to analyze and respond to cybersecurity incidents in a timely manner

ss.title: Security Information and Event Management
ss.subtitle: Collect information from any device. Recognize potential security incidents and alert investigators.

ss.title: Security Orchestration, Automation and Response
ss.subtitle: Build digital workflows to support security operations center (SOC) in implementing security controls. Quickly verify and respond to potential security incidents.

ss.title: User & Event Behavior Analytics
ss.subtitle: Detect and analyze abnormal user behavior patterns to prevent potential threats.

ss.title: Breach and Attack Simulation
ss.subtitle: Continually test to ensure the strength of your security controls.

services.scope: End-to-end cybersecurity solutions. Our professionals monitor threats and incidents via incident response framework.

ss.title: Managed Threat Detection
ss.subtitle: Managed Threat Detection is our SOC as a Service. Cloud Native SIEM and integrated Threat Intelligence focus on giving customers highest level of security.

ss.title: Managed Detection and Response
ss.subtitle: Managed Detection and Response is a service for EDR monitoring solutions. We contain threats and provide incident reports.

ss.title: Vulnerability Assessment
ss.subtitle: Vulnerability assessment service to help you verify vulnerabilities and implement remediation plans.

customer.title: Customer Success
customer.subtitle: Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard dummy text ever since the 1500s,

highlight.title: Identify suspicious transactions from ransomware within 3 days
highlight.desc: Blendata’s only needs 3 days to comb through 6 months of big data to identify suspicious transactions. The quick response prevents system shutdown which could lead to tremendous loss.
highlight.content-title: Fast and effective customer service is the key to retaining the customer base
highlight.content-desc: As one of Thailand’s leading mobile phone operators with more than 40 million customers countrywide, fast and effective customer service is the key to retaining the customer base. It relies on various types of data such as personal data and usage logs, through numerous channels and devices to analyse and fix issues. The data size constantly grows larger as mobile users always update and change their information until the storage becomes huge and staggering in different departments. It takes weeks to collect information and investigate a customer complaint affecting service quality.

case1.subtitle: Data Warehouse
case1.title: Search 10 years of history within seconds to efficiently support your business
case1.desc: Blendata’s overcomes the restriction of conventional big data storage with a new solution that allows organizations to store and search 10 years of data within seconds, superseding traditional data archiving to support your business and reduces TCO by half.
case1.content-title: Fast and effective customer service is the key to retaining the customer base
case1.content-desc: As one of Thailand’s leading mobile phone operators with more than 40 million customers countrywide, fast and effective customer service is the key to retaining the customer base. It relies on various types of data such as personal data and usage logs, through numerous channels and devices to analyse and fix issues. The data size constantly grows larger as mobile users always update and change their information until the storage becomes huge and staggering in different departments. It takes weeks to collect information and investigate a customer complaint affecting service quality.

case2.subtitle: Data Archiving
case2.title: Impress customers by reducing big data management time from weeks to seconds
case2.desc: Create an operational data warehouse to reduce customer complaint handling time from 2 weeks to seconds and quickly deliver a solution to the customer to ensure the best experience and satisfaction.
case2.content-title: Fast and effective customer service is the key to retaining the customer base
case2.content-desc: As one of Thailand’s leading mobile phone operators with more than 40 million customers countrywide, fast and effective customer service is the key to retaining the customer base. It relies on various types of data such as personal data and usage logs, through numerous channels and devices to analyse and fix issues. The data size constantly grows larger as mobile users always update and change their information until the storage becomes huge and staggering in different departments. It takes weeks to collect information and investigate a customer complaint affecting service quality.

case3.subtitle: Cybersecurity Data Lake
case3.title: Conduct forensics within seconds with enhanced cybersecurity for banks
case3.desc: In the past, security analysts couldn’t conduct forensics on big data. With Blendata’s centralized data storage, security data analysts can conduct forensics and fix issues instantly as well as analyse data independently to create threat patterns to protect customers’ data actively.
case3.content-title: Fast and effective customer service is the key to retaining the customer base
case3.content-desc: As one of Thailand’s leading mobile phone operators with more than 40 million customers countrywide, fast and effective customer service is the key to retaining the customer base. It relies on various types of data such as personal data and usage logs, through numerous channels and devices to analyse and fix issues. The data size constantly grows larger as mobile users always update and change their information until the storage becomes huge and staggering in different departments. It takes weeks to collect information and investigate a customer complaint affecting service quality.
